member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.AreCharactersLocal
member.summary: Determines whether the specified characters are local.
member.param: Array of characters.
The number of elements in the character array.

Specifies whether to enqueue a download request
if any of the specified characters are not local.

Receives TRUE if all of the specified characters are local,
FALSE if any of the specified characters are remote.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.AreGlyphsLocal
member.summary: Determines whether the specified glyphs are local.
member.param: Array of glyph indices.
The number of elements in the glyph index array.

Specifies whether to enqueue a download request
if any of the specified glyphs are not local.

Receives TRUE if all of the specified glyphs are local,
FALSE if any of the specified glyphs are remote.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetFaceNames
member.summary: Creates a localized strings object that contains the face names for the font (for example, Regular or Bold), indexed by locale name.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created localized strings object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetFamilyNames
member.summary: Creates a localized strings object that contains the family names for the font family, indexed by locale name.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created localized strings object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetFontFaceReference
member.summary: Gets a font face reference that identifies this font.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created font face reference object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetInformationalStrings
member.summary: Gets a localized strings collection that contains the specified informational strings, indexed by locale name.
member.param: A -typed value that identifies the strings to get.
A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created localized strings object.
A pointer to a variable that receives whether the font contains the specified string ID. TRUE if the font contains the specified string ID; otherwise, FALSE.
member.returns: If the font doesn't contain the specified string, the return value is S_OK, but informationalStrings receives a NULL pointer and exists receives the value FALSE.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetPanose
member.summary: Gets the PANOSE values from the font, used for font selection and matching.
member.param: A pointer to a structure that receives the PANOSE values from the font.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetRecommendedRenderingMode
member.summary: Determines the recommended text rendering and grid-fit mode to be used based on the font, size, world transform, and measuring mode.
member.param: Logical font size in DIPs.
Number of pixels per logical inch in the horizontal direction.
Number of pixels per logical inch in the vertical direction.
A structure that describes the world transform.
Specifies whether the font is sideways. TRUE if the font is sideways; otherwise, FALSE.
A -typed value that specifies the quality of the graphics system's outline rendering, affects the size threshold above which outline rendering is used.
A -typed value that specifies the method used to measure during text layout. For proper glyph spacing, this method returns a rendering mode that is compatible with the specified measuring mode.
A pointer to a interface for the rendering parameters object. This parameter is necessary in case the rendering parameters object overrides the rendering mode.
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value for the recommended rendering mode.
A pointer to a variable that receives a -typed value for the recommended grid-fit mode.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetStretch
member.summary: Gets the stretch (also known as width) of this font.
member.returns: Returns a -typed value that specifies the degree to which a font has been stretched compared to a font's normal aspect ratio.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetStyle
member.summary: Gets the style (also known as slope) of this font.
member.returns: Returns a -typed value that specifies the style of the font.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.GetWeight
member.summary: Gets the weight of this font.
member.returns: Returns a -typed value that specifies the density of a typeface, in terms of the lightness or heaviness of the strokes.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.HasCharacter
member.summary: Determines whether the font supports the specified character.
member.param: A Unicode (UCS-4) character value.
member.returns: Returns whether the font supports the specified character. Returns TRUE if the font has the specified character; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.IsCharacterLocal
member.summary: Determines whether the character is locally downloaded from the font.
member.param: A Unicode (UCS-4) character value.
member.returns:
Returns TRUE if the font has the specified character locally available,
FALSE if not or if the font does not support that character.

member.name: IDWriteFontFace3.IsGlyphLocal
member.summary: Determines whether the glyph is locally downloaded from the font.
member.param: Glyph identifier.
member.returns: Returns TRUE if the font has the specified glyph locally available.

summary.para: Represents an absolute reference to a font face. This interface contains font face type, appropriate file references, and face identification data.
This interface extends . Various font data such as metrics, names, and glyph outlines are obtained from IDWriteFontFace.
